title: A Map told me to do this...

replies.body: Which map is this? It seems very familiar, though. XD

replies.body:
I put that sign there! I'm famous!

<3

replies.body:
I dont like the holiday Quintus :/ the towers where the diamonds are, are totally out of wood, so you cant quickly get the diamonds from below :/

BTW, I saw an alien melon attack on Candyland 1 a few days ago xD

+1
Halloween maps were okay, but while holiday maps look good, the gameplay is ruined.

replies.body: It's nice to have some "easter eggs" on the server :) They should have some in the new hub! It makes it fun to explore!

replies.body: Agreed , the hub looks amazing now in my opinion however it doesn't have that same nice feel it had back in McZone due to size.
